name: The Shield of Mouston
description:
[Keyboard] and (Controller) Supported
[Enter] (Start) - Start/Try Again
[A/D] (Left Stick) - Move Left/Right
[Q/E] (Left/Right Shoulders) - "Slam" Move Left/Right
[Spacebar] (A or Nintendo B) - Parry
[M] - Toggle Audio Mute

The Shield of Mouston

Play as a heroic mouse, operating the Shield of Mouston. Block the evil cats from harming your delicate machinery. Simply blocking a cat absorbs their evil energy. If you absorb too much in a short time, you will be stunned and forced to emergency exhaust it all. You can parry cats to dissipate them and absorb no evil energy. Try to survive all 9Cats^2 waves.

Made for Mini Jam 127
Theme: Cats^2
Limitation: Use a 6 color palette
Additionally I chose to retroactively tack on LowRezJam 2022 to this project. So the resolution is 64x64 and a further gameplay limitation I chose was "Block".
